text: Hi Andreas, thanks for your reply! I'll try this :slightly_smiling_face:

Awesome! for reference this is where most of the hubdb related docs are <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/data/hubdb>

And then you can reference the API docs for hubdb to grab the different filter options <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/hubdb/v2/get_table_rows>

Hi there, I am trying to add a value to a custom object property, which includes HTML tags in it. The email seems to pull the html tags as text. I remember I've used a similar value in the past and it did render the html tags correctly in the email. What do you think I am missing in this email template? Can someone please guide me here!
